item.title: 5. Rooting the Internet in Community & Place
item.description: Rooting the Internet in Community & Place or using tradition as the basis for engaging with technology and progress anchored to the long term fate of a place as an antidote to apathy

item.title: 1. Agency & Limits
item.description: 1. Agency & Limits For a Generationally Healthy Society Empathetic relationships with the people and places around us yield agency bounded by affection.
